name: Froggy
overview: This game involves you crossing a busy road full of racing cars, buggies, bulldozers and lorries, to the central bank; then crossing a fast-flowing river with turtles and logs, to the safety of your froghole. Each frog has twenty seconds to reach the safety of it's bay. When five frogs are safely home, the game restarts on a harder level. After each game, the top ten scores are displayed including your own if you reach 500 or more points. Froggy was programmed by 3 Northumbrian Prudhoe Community High School 6th formers, Jeffrey, Stephen and David, and published on their own JSD Software label.
